radiographic_examinations.findings: Moderate hiatal hernia with suture material and surgical clips, wall thickening and mild surrounding fat stranding of the mid sigmoid colon compatible with known diverticulitis, pericolonic abscess measuring 3.1 x 2.0 x 1.6 cm, extensive diverticulosis throughout the entire colon, normal appendix, multilobulated lesion in the left adnexa with several hypodensities measuring up to 1.2 cm, moderate to severe compression deformity of L2 vertebral body.
